trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_SEQ_00<tab>The moogle on the watchtower is cradling her rumbling tummy.

TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_SEQ_01<tab>It is almost time for a change in shift, and this poor moogle's replacement is nowhere to be found. Slay four tulihands to secure a safe path and ensure the moogle on the watchtower does not starve.
TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the tulihands, and now the shift replacement should be able to report to duty safely. Deliver the good news to the hungry moogle.
TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_SEQ_03<tab>The on duty moogle hurries home after hearing your report, eager to get her hands on some kupo nuts.
TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_TODO_01<tab>Report to the moogle on lookout duty.

TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_MONITORINGMOG01835_000_000<tab>Whatever can be taking her so long, kupo? My replacement should've been here already, but I don't see her anywhere. I'm so hungry... I wager she went home on account of those troublesome tulihands that're flapping about.
TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_MONITORINGMOG01835_000_001<tab>If you slay four of them that should secure a safe path, giving my replacement no excuse. Please, my stomach begs you, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_MONITORINGMOG01835_000_010<tab>I can't go on, I need some kupo nuts... Adventurer, please slay the tulihands for me!

TEXT_HEAVNZ417_01835_MONITORINGMOG01835_000_020<tab>Thank you! Now that the tulihands are out of the way, it's only a matter of time before my replacement gets here! I'm about to pass out from hunger, so I think I'll go ahead. What could go wrong, kupo?
